channel.title: Heroes of Newerth
channel.description:
It looks much more fun than LoL IMO, my friends have played both and they think HoN is better, opinions?
http://www.heroesofnewerth.com/

item.title: Heroes of Newerth
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I haven’t played HoN much but I read a lot of reviews that said it was more similar to dota than LoL. The graphics is really nice but I like the cartoony style of LoL more (for some reason it reminds me of warcraft???).

Read full topic

item.title: Heroes of Newerth
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Heroes of newerth is basically dota with better grafix
but heroes of newerth copied the entire concept.
can’t wait for dota 2 to come out
but keep in mind warcraft 3 cameout about 12 years ago
Yet it’s graphics and concepts still meet up or over rides the basic graphics of modern developed games

Read full topic

item.title: Heroes of Newerth
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I’ve never played LoL or HoN. From the looks of it though, LoL seems more fun, but I could be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Heroes of Newerth
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Downloaded and gave it a try last night. I was surprised how exact it was to LoL, despite the graphical difference. I didn’t play very far through because I wanted to play LoL originally, but I can see where it could be just as fun. Like Davidi2 said though, I prefer the graphical style of LoL over this game.

Now that my World of Warcraft download is finished, let’s give that a try…

Read full topic

item.title: Heroes of Newerth
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:442636”]I’ve watched videos of it, the graphics style doesn’t appeal to me for this type of game. And it’s much harder to distinguish spells and such, I like the simplicity of LoL (which is also getting a graphics update).

You can just ask why the professional players almost all moved over to LoL, and it’s because for the most part Riot tries harder to balance champions, and overall it’s a more fun game (because LoL focuses more on player combat in the gold aspect, whereas HoN you’re just farming mobs). One interesting part of HoN is the terrain system though.[/quote]
I like LoL, and I like HoN. But I really like the way the terrain is going on in HoN though, since I have just started playing I can see the difference

Read full topic

item.title: Heroes of Newerth
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’ve watched videos of it, the graphics style doesn’t appeal to me for this type of game. And it’s much harder to distinguish spells and such, I like the simplicity of LoL (which is also getting a graphics update).

You can just ask why the professional players almost all moved over to LoL, and it’s because for the most part Riot tries harder to balance champions, and overall it’s a more fun game (because LoL focuses more on player combat in the gold aspect, whereas HoN you’re just farming mobs). One interesting part of HoN is the terrain system though.

Read full topic
